graph module

Defines the LangGraph workflow for the Nexus-Science agent.

This module sets up the state graph, nodes, and edges for the multi-agent research process.

graph.check_confidence(state: AgentState)[source]

Conditional edge to check if the confidence score is sufficient or if max iterations are reached.

graph.cross_pollination_node(state: AgentState)[source]

Node for cross-pollination between experts.

graph.debate_node(state: AgentState)[source]

Node for the debate phase.

graph.hypothesis_node(state: AgentState)[source]

Node for generating hypotheses from experts. PARALLELIZED.

graph.recruit_node(state: AgentState)[source]

Node for recruiting experts.

Parameters:

state (AgentState) – The current state of the workflow.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the recruited ‘experts’ and initializing ‘iterations’.

Return type:

dict

graph.synthesis_node(state: AgentState)[source]

Node for synthesizing the final solution. Uses Pydantic structured output.
